name: Sticky City
description:
Sticky City is a fun and simple game made in two days as a fun project for the Beginner Circle 2020 Jam . The objective is to get the ball in the cup. If you want to help out you can leave a donation but its okay if you don't.

The controls are simple, Its just "a" to move the Slime Ball left and "d" to move the Slime Ball right. To jump its space and you can climb walls and the celling. To drop from the celling its space or "s".
